item.title: ALU
item.description: ALU What is an ALU An arithmetic-logic unit is the part of a central processing unit that carries out arithmetic and logic operations on the operands in computer instruction words.

item.description: Components Of Computer System System Unit Mother Board Processor Ram VGA Adaptor

item.title: Software Vs Hardware
item.description: Software vs Hardware Â Computer software and hardware require each other – neither can be used on its own

item.title: What is a Computer
item.description: What is a computer network A computer [[nibm_notes/introduction_to_computer_science/computer_networks/network_definition|network ]] is inter connection of two or more computers using a connection medium in a way that computers can share resources.

item.title: What is a Computer System
item.description: What Is Computer System A computer system is a set of hardware used for executing software Definition of a computer changes accordingly [[nibm_notes/introduction_to_computer_science/computer_hardware/what_is_ict#- Definition of a computer related to ICT|According to ICT what is a computer]] [[nibm_notes/introduction_to_computer_science/computer_hardware/what_is_computer_science#- Definition of a computer related computer science|According to Computer Science what is a computer]]

item.title: What is Computer Science
item.description: What is Computer Science Computer science is the design and development of new software applications and optimization of existing software or components and implementation of new communication systems.

item.title: What is ICT
item.description: What Is ICT ICT is the use of already developed software applications hardware components and communication systems. - Definition of a computer related to ICT - A computer system has four main components i.
